summary: This document is a UBS Client Relationship Agreement and account opening package for Ghislaine Maxwell, establishing multiple 'RMA Domestic - Sole Owner' brokerage accounts. It details her personal information, financial profile, investment objectives, and includes her signed agreement to the terms, including a margin agreement and arbitration clause.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The sole owner and primary account holder for multiple UBS Resource Management Accounts (RMA). The document contains her personal information, financial details, and her signature on the agreement.

persons.name: Scott Stackman
persons.context: Listed as a Financial Advisor for Ghislaine Maxwell, with contact information provided in the electronic delivery consent section.

persons.name: Lyle Casriel
persons.context: Listed alongside Scott Stackman as a Financial Advisor for Ghislaine Maxwell, with contact information provided.

connections.description: Scott Stackman is listed as a Financial Advisor for Ghislaine Maxwell's UBS accounts.
Lyle Casriel is listed as a Financial Advisor for Ghislaine Maxwell's UBS accounts.

events.title: Account Agreement Execution
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell signs the UBS Client Relationship Agreement, establishing multiple sole-owner brokerage accounts.

locations: New York, NY 10065-7007 (Ghislaine Maxwell's residential and account mailing address)
UBS AG, Cayman Islands Branch (mentioned in context of International Deposit Account Sweep Program)
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's stated net worth (excluding primary residence) and liquid assets were both in the range of '$10,000,000 AND ABOVE'.
She listed her employer as 'The TerraMar Project', an organization she founded.
The source of funds for the accounts was indicated as 'Other Income Source transfer'.
Maxwell certified that no account holders or their associates were current or former U.S. or non-U.S. political officials.
The document includes a pre-dispute arbitration clause, which she agreed to by signing.
